Title: Prison Break: The Final Break
Writer: Paul Scheuring (creator), Nick Santora (teleplay), Seth Hoffman (teleplay), Zack Estrin (teleplay), Karyn Usher (teleplay), Christian W. Trokey (story), Kalinda Vazquez (story)
Actors: Dominic Purcell, Wentworth Miller, Amaury Nolasco, Robert Knepper
Plot: Michael and Sara wed, but the happiness is short-lived when the Feds apprehend her for the murder of Michael's mother, Christina. Once a hit is ordered on Sara, the team reunite to break out the increasingly vulnerable target.
